name: Perplexity AI
description: AI-powered answer engine providing real-time, cited answers using advanced language models. Offers both a web interface and API access for developers.
features: Multiple AI models available (Free and Pro tiers, API)

pricing.free_tier: Yes, standard features, limited Pro searches per day.

paid_tiers.name: Pro
features: Choice of advanced AI models (GPT-4, Claude 3, Perplexity models)

pricing.notes: API pricing is usage-based and varies by model. See documentation for details (e.g., pplx-7b-online $0.28/M tokens, llama-3-sonar-large-32k-online $1.0/M tokens).

use_cases.title: Research & Information Gathering
use_cases.description: Quickly find and synthesize information from the web with cited sources.
use_cases.example: Asking 'What are the latest developments in renewable energy?' and getting a summarized answer with links.

use_cases.title: Content Creation Assistance
use_cases.description: Generate ideas, outlines, or drafts for articles, emails, or reports.
use_cases.example: Using the 'Writing' focus mode to brainstorm blog post ideas.

use_cases.title: Coding Help
use_cases.description: Get explanations for code snippets or generate code.
use_cases.example: Pasting a Python function and asking for an explanation or optimization.

cons: Free tier has usage limits on advanced features
AI can still hallucinate or provide inaccurate information
Image generation limited to non-commercial use

performance_metrics.latency: Varies by model, generally low for online models
performance_metrics.accuracy: High, with citations, but not infallible

scalability: API designed for scaling with usage-based pricing and rate limits.

training_resources.description: Frequently asked questions about the service.
Updates and articles from the Perplexity team.

security_compliance.data_protection: Standard data privacy measures. Enterprise plan offers enhanced controls and SOC2 compliance.
